de.avgl.dmp.converter.reader

Class QucosaReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.avgl.dmp.converter.reader.QucosaReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.culturegraph.mf.framework.LifeCycle, org.culturegraph.mf.framework.ObjectPipe<java.io.Reader,org.culturegraph.mf.framework.StreamReceiver>, org.culturegraph.mf.framework.ObjectReceiver<java.io.Reader>, org.culturegraph.mf.framework.Sender<org.culturegraph.mf.framework.StreamReceiver>, org.culturegraph.mf.stream.reader.Reader

    @Description(value="Read a Qucosa OAI=PMH file. Complete file is interpreted as one record. Provide the record tag if necessary.")
@In(value=org.culturegraph.mf.stream.reader.Reader.class)
@Out(value=org.culturegraph.mf.framework.StreamReceiver.class)
public final class QucosaReader
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.culturegraph.mf.stream.reader.Reader
    Read a Qucosa OAI-PMH file. This class implements Reader directly instead of extending e.g. ReaderBase b/c implementations would emit records line wise while the Qucosa record is one XML document per file.
    Author:
    Paul Horn
